items.description: A bittersweet herbal liqueur traditionally consumed as a digestif.

The primary alcoholic component of a cocktail (e.g., gin, rum, vodka).

Sweetened, flavored spirits or liqueurs.

A spirit or liqueur traditionally consumed after a meal.
Juice squeezed shortly before use, preferred over bottled.
